info.title: BridgeIt Services REST API Documentation and Client
info.description: This is the REST API Documentation for BridgeIt Services.  It's also a dynamic client that you can use to exercise the API and try it out.

license.name: ICESOFT COMMERCIAL SOURCE CODE LICENSE V 1.1

get.description: Retrieve a single specific record associated with the resourceId.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

200.description: Returns a single, specific record uniquely identified by the resourceId

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

post.description: Save a specific Location using the provided resourceId as the key.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The resource to be saved.

201.description: Returns a unique resource id URI in the Location: header as well as in the body of the response.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

delete.description: Delete a specific Location associated with the resourceId.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

204.description: Indicates that the resource was successfully deleted.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

get.description: Retrieve one or more Locations.  Instead of specifying a specific resourceId, the results are determined by optionally setting database query options.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: A flag indicating if you want "all" records (default) for this query or just "one". (all|one)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A valid search query.  If omitted, the default query is used.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify which fields to include/exclude in the response.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Other options for the query (e.g. paging and sorting).

200.description: All resources that match the query.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

post.description: Save a specific Location.  Since the resourceId is not provided, one is generated for by the server.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The resource to be saved.

201.description: Returns a resourceId URI in the Location: header as well as in the body of the response.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

delete.description: Deletes one or more Locations.  Instead of specifying a specific resourceId, the results are determined by optionally setting database query options.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A valid search query.  If omitted, the default query is used.

204.description: Indicates that the resource was successfully deleted.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

get.summary: Retrieve one or more Points of Interest (POI)
get.description: Retrieve one or more Points of Interest (POI).  Instead of specifying a specific resource id, the results are determined by optionally setting database query options.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: results
parameters.description: A flag indicating if you want "all" location records (default) for this query or just "one". (all|one)

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A valid search query.  If omitted, the default query is used.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify which fields to include/exclude in the response.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Other options for the query (e.g. paging and sorting).

200.description: All Points of Interest (POI) that match the query.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

post.description: Save a specific Point of Interest (POI)  Since the resourceId is not provided, one is generated for by the server.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The resource to be saved.

201.description: Returns a resourceId URI in the Location: header as well as in the body of the response.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

delete.summary: Remove one or more Points of Interest (POI)
delete.description: Delete one or more Points of Interest (POI).  Instead of specifying a specific resource id, the results are determined by optionally setting database query options.

parameters.name: realmId
parameters.description: The realm under which this resource is managed.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The unique id associated with this specific resource.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A valid search query.  If omitted, the default query is used.

204.description: Indicates that the POI was successfully deleted.

400.description: Invalid request. Parameters may be missing or incorrect.

401.description: Unable to perform operation due to invalid permission.

404.description: Could not find the resource associated with this id.

Location.description: A Location represents a users location information (longitude, latitude) in GeoJSON format. It also includes related metadata and optional, custom properties.

label.description: Human friendly name for this resource.

location.description: The GeoJSON record for this resource.

properties.description: Optional, additional properties of the resource.

altitude.description: The altitude of the Location in meters.

POI.description: A point of interest (POI). Includes meta data and a single GeoJSON Point.

label.description: Human friendly name for this resource.

location.description: The GeoJSON record for this resource.

properties.description: Optional, additional properties of the resource.

altitude.description: The altitude of the POI in meters.

Region.description: A Region represents a geographic area in GeoJSON format - a bounding polygon that consists of a closed set of geographic (longitude, latitude) points. It also includes related metadata and optional, custom properties.

label.description: Optional, human friendly name for this resource.

location.description: The GeoJSON record for this resource.

type.description: Part of the GeoJSON spec (inserted if not provided).

properties.description: Optional, additional properties of the resource.

tags.description: An array of strings to help group and classify the Region.

altitude.description: The altitude of the Region in meters.

Monitor.description: A Monitor is used to identify the locations and events to listen for as well as which endpoints to notify when an event of interest occurs. - namely a bounding polygon that consists of a closed set of geographic (longitude, latitude) points. It also includes related metadata and optional, custom properties.

label.description: Optional, human friendly name for this resource.

active.description: Indicates whether or not this monitor is currently active.

elapsedTimeLimit.description: The time in minutes after which a location update is considered a new entry rather than an update to a previous location.

locationChangeLimit.description: The minimum distance in meters for a location change to be considered significant.

locationNearLimit.description: The minimum distance in meters required to be considered near a Point of Interest (POI).

regions.description: A collection of resourceIds and/or tags referencing Regions.

ids.description: Set of resourceIds representing the Regions to be monitored.

tags.description: Set of tags describing the Regions to be monitored.

poi.description: A collection of resourceIds and/or tags referencing Points of Interest (POI)

ids.description: Set of resourceIds representing the Points of Interest to be monitored.

tags.description: Set of tags representing the Points of Interest to be monitored.

events.description: Set of event names that the Monitor should listen for.

destinations.description: Set of endpoints to call when the monitor detects a valid location trigger or event.

url.description: A legal URL endpoint to notify when a valid locate event occurs.

properties.description: Information to be sent along to the endpoint as the payload.
